72 TypeId
73 TcpSocketBase::GetTypeId (void)
74 {
75  static TypeId tid = TypeId ("ns3::TcpSocketBase")
76  .SetParent<TcpSocket> ()
77  .SetGroupName ("Internet")
78  .AddConstructor<TcpSocketBase> ()
79 // .AddAttribute ("TcpState", "State in TCP state machine",
80 // TypeId::ATTR_GET,
81 // EnumValue (CLOSED),
82 // MakeEnumAccessor (&TcpSocketBase::m_state),
83 // MakeEnumChecker (CLOSED, "Closed"))
84  .AddAttribute ("MaxSegLifetime",
85  "Maximum segment lifetime in seconds, use for TIME_WAIT state transition to CLOSED state",
86  DoubleValue (120), /* RFC793 says MSL=2 minutes*/
87  MakeDoubleAccessor (&TcpSocketBase::m_msl),
88  MakeDoubleChecker<double> (0))
89  .AddAttribute ("MaxWindowSize", "Max size of advertised window",
90  UintegerValue (65535),
91  MakeUintegerAccessor (&TcpSocketBase::m_maxWinSize),
92  MakeUintegerChecker<uint16_t> ())
93  .AddAttribute ("IcmpCallback", "Callback invoked whenever an icmp error is received on this socket.",
94  CallbackValue (),
95  MakeCallbackAccessor (&TcpSocketBase::m_icmpCallback),
96  MakeCallbackChecker ())
97  .AddAttribute ("IcmpCallback6", "Callback invoked whenever an icmpv6 error is received on this socket.",
98  CallbackValue (),
99  MakeCallbackAccessor (&TcpSocketBase::m_icmpCallback6),
100  MakeCallbackChecker ())
101  .AddAttribute ("WindowScaling", "Enable or disable Window Scaling option",
102  BooleanValue (true),
103  MakeBooleanAccessor (&TcpSocketBase::m_winScalingEnabled),
104  MakeBooleanChecker ())
105  .AddAttribute ("Sack", "Enable or disable Sack option",
106  BooleanValue (true),
107  MakeBooleanAccessor (&TcpSocketBase::m_sackEnabled),
108  MakeBooleanChecker ())
109  .AddAttribute ("Timestamp", "Enable or disable Timestamp option",
110  BooleanValue (true),
111  MakeBooleanAccessor (&TcpSocketBase::m_timestampEnabled),
112  MakeBooleanChecker ())
113  .AddAttribute ("MinRto",
114  "Minimum retransmit timeout value",
115  TimeValue (Seconds (1.0)), // RFC 6298 says min RTO=1 sec, but Linux uses 200ms.
116  // See http://www.postel.org/pipermail/end2end-interest/2004-November/004402.html
117  MakeTimeAccessor (&TcpSocketBase::SetMinRto,
118  &TcpSocketBase::GetMinRto),
119  MakeTimeChecker ())
120  .AddAttribute ("ClockGranularity",
121  "Clock Granularity used in RTO calculations",
122  TimeValue (MilliSeconds (1)), // RFC6298 suggest to use fine clock granularity
123  MakeTimeAccessor (&TcpSocketBase::SetClockGranularity,
124  &TcpSocketBase::GetClockGranularity),
125  MakeTimeChecker ())
126  .AddAttribute ("TxBuffer",
127  "TCP Tx buffer",
128  PointerValue (),
129  MakePointerAccessor (&TcpSocketBase::GetTxBuffer),
130  MakePointerChecker<TcpTxBuffer> ())
131  .AddAttribute ("RxBuffer",
132  "TCP Rx buffer",
133  PointerValue (),
134  MakePointerAccessor (&TcpSocketBase::GetRxBuffer),
135  MakePointerChecker<TcpRxBuffer> ())
136  .AddAttribute ("ReTxThreshold", "Threshold for fast retransmit",
137  UintegerValue (3),
138  MakeUintegerAccessor (&TcpSocketBase::SetRetxThresh,
139  &TcpSocketBase::GetRetxThresh),
140  MakeUintegerChecker<uint32_t> ())
141  .AddAttribute ("LimitedTransmit", "Enable limited transmit",
142  BooleanValue (true),
143  MakeBooleanAccessor (&TcpSocketBase::m_limitedTx),
144  MakeBooleanChecker ())
145  .AddAttribute ("UseEcn", "Parameter to set ECN functionality",
146  EnumValue (TcpSocketState::Off),
147  MakeEnumAccessor (&TcpSocketBase::SetUseEcn),
148  MakeEnumChecker (TcpSocketState::Off, "Off",
149  TcpSocketState::On, "On",
150  TcpSocketState::AcceptOnly, "AcceptOnly"))
151  .AddTraceSource ("RTO",
152  "Retransmission timeout",
153  MakeTraceSourceAccessor (&TcpSocketBase::m_rto),
154  "ns3::TracedValueCallback::Time")
155  .AddTraceSource ("RTT",
156  "Last RTT sample",
157  MakeTraceSourceAccessor (&TcpSocketBase::m_lastRttTrace),
158  "ns3::TracedValueCallback::Time")
159  .AddTraceSource ("NextTxSequence",
160  "Next sequence number to send (SND.NXT)",
161  MakeTraceSourceAccessor (&TcpSocketBase::m_nextTxSequenceTrace),
162  "ns3::SequenceNumber32TracedValueCallback")
163  .AddTraceSource ("HighestSequence",
164  "Highest sequence number ever sent in socket's life time",
165  MakeTraceSourceAccessor (&TcpSocketBase::m_highTxMarkTrace),
166  "ns3::TracedValueCallback::SequenceNumber32")
167  .AddTraceSource ("State",
168  "TCP state",
169  MakeTraceSourceAccessor (&TcpSocketBase::m_state),
170  "ns3::TcpStatesTracedValueCallback")

172  "TCP Congestion machine state",

174  "ns3::TcpSocketState::TcpCongStatesTracedValueCallback")
175  .AddTraceSource ("EcnState",
176  "Trace ECN state change of socket",
177  MakeTraceSourceAccessor (&TcpSocketBase::m_ecnStateTrace),
178  "ns3::TcpSocketState::EcnStatesTracedValueCallback")
179  .AddTraceSource ("AdvWND",
180  "Advertised Window Size",

182  "ns3::TracedValueCallback::Uint32")
183  .AddTraceSource ("RWND",

201  MakeTraceSourceAccessor (&TcpSocketBase::m_cWndTrace),
202  "ns3::TracedValueCallback::Uint32")
203  .AddTraceSource ("CongestionWindowInflated",
204  "The TCP connection's congestion window inflates as in older RFC",
205  MakeTraceSourceAccessor (&TcpSocketBase::m_cWndInflTrace),
206  "ns3::TracedValueCallback::Uint32")
207  .AddTraceSource ("SlowStartThreshold",
208  "TCP slow start threshold (bytes)",
209  MakeTraceSourceAccessor (&TcpSocketBase::m_ssThTrace),
210  "ns3::TracedValueCallback::Uint32")
211  .AddTraceSource ("Tx",
212  "Send tcp packet to IP protocol",
213  MakeTraceSourceAccessor (&TcpSocketBase::m_txTrace),
214  "ns3::TcpSocketBase::TcpTxRxTracedCallback")
215  .AddTraceSource ("Rx",
216  "Receive tcp packet from IP protocol",
217  MakeTraceSourceAccessor (&TcpSocketBase::m_rxTrace),
218  "ns3::TcpSocketBase::TcpTxRxTracedCallback")
219  .AddTraceSource ("EcnEchoSeq",
220  "Sequence of last received ECN Echo",
221  MakeTraceSourceAccessor (&TcpSocketBase::m_ecnEchoSeq),
222  "ns3::SequenceNumber32TracedValueCallback")
223  .AddTraceSource ("EcnCeSeq",
224  "Sequence of last received CE ",
225  MakeTraceSourceAccessor (&TcpSocketBase::m_ecnCESeq),
226  "ns3::SequenceNumber32TracedValueCallback")
227  .AddTraceSource ("EcnCwrSeq",
228  "Sequence of last received CWR",
229  MakeTraceSourceAccessor (&TcpSocketBase::m_ecnCWRSeq),
230  "ns3::SequenceNumber32TracedValueCallback")
231  ;
232  return tid;
233 }

241 TcpSocketBase::TcpSocketBase (void)
242  : TcpSocket ()
243 {
244  NS_LOG_FUNCTION (this);
245  m_txBuffer = CreateObject<TcpTxBuffer> ();
246  m_tcb = CreateObject<TcpSocketState> ();
247  m_rateOps = CreateObject <TcpRateLinux> ();
248 
249  m_tcb->m_rxBuffer = CreateObject<TcpRxBuffer> ();
250 
251  m_tcb->m_currentPacingRate = m_tcb->m_maxPacingRate;
252  m_pacingTimer.SetFunction (&TcpSocketBase::NotifyPacingPerformed, this);
253 
254  m_tcb->m_sendEmptyPacketCallback = MakeCallback (&TcpSocketBase::SendEmptyPacket, this);
255 
256  bool ok;
257 
258  ok = m_tcb->TraceConnectWithoutContext ("CongestionWindow",
259  MakeCallback (&TcpSocketBase::UpdateCwnd, this));
260  NS_ASSERT (ok == true);
261 
262  ok = m_tcb->TraceConnectWithoutContext ("CongestionWindowInflated",
263  MakeCallback (&TcpSocketBase::UpdateCwndInfl, this));
264  NS_ASSERT (ok == true);
265 
266  ok = m_tcb->TraceConnectWithoutContext ("SlowStartThreshold",
267  MakeCallback (&TcpSocketBase::UpdateSsThresh, this));
268  NS_ASSERT (ok == true);
269 
270  ok = m_tcb->TraceConnectWithoutContext ("CongState",
271  MakeCallback (&TcpSocketBase::UpdateCongState, this));
272  NS_ASSERT (ok == true);
273 
274  ok = m_tcb->TraceConnectWithoutContext ("EcnState",
275  MakeCallback (&TcpSocketBase::UpdateEcnState, this));
276  NS_ASSERT (ok == true);
277 
278  ok = m_tcb->TraceConnectWithoutContext ("NextTxSequence",
279  MakeCallback (&TcpSocketBase::UpdateNextTxSequence, this));
280  NS_ASSERT (ok == true);
281 
282  ok = m_tcb->TraceConnectWithoutContext ("HighestSequence",
283  MakeCallback (&TcpSocketBase::UpdateHighTxMark, this));
284  NS_ASSERT (ok == true);
285 
286  ok = m_tcb->TraceConnectWithoutContext ("BytesInFlight",
287  MakeCallback (&TcpSocketBase::UpdateBytesInFlight, this));
288  NS_ASSERT (ok == true);
289 
290  ok = m_tcb->TraceConnectWithoutContext ("RTT",
291  MakeCallback (&TcpSocketBase::UpdateRtt, this));
292  NS_ASSERT (ok == true);
293 }

295 TcpSocketBase::TcpSocketBase (const TcpSocketBase& sock)
296  : TcpSocket (sock),
297  //copy object::m_tid and socket::callbacks
298  m_dupAckCount (sock.m_dupAckCount),
299  m_delAckCount (0),
300  m_delAckMaxCount (sock.m_delAckMaxCount),
301  m_noDelay (sock.m_noDelay),
302  m_synCount (sock.m_synCount),
303  m_synRetries (sock.m_synRetries),
304  m_dataRetrCount (sock.m_dataRetrCount),
305  m_dataRetries (sock.m_dataRetries),
306  m_rto (sock.m_rto),
307  m_minRto (sock.m_minRto),
308  m_clockGranularity (sock.m_clockGranularity),
309  m_delAckTimeout (sock.m_delAckTimeout),
310  m_persistTimeout (sock.m_persistTimeout),
311  m_cnTimeout (sock.m_cnTimeout),
312  m_endPoint (nullptr),
313  m_endPoint6 (nullptr),
314  m_node (sock.m_node),
315  m_tcp (sock.m_tcp),
316  m_state (sock.m_state),
317  m_errno (sock.m_errno),
318  m_closeNotified (sock.m_closeNotified),
319  m_closeOnEmpty (sock.m_closeOnEmpty),
320  m_shutdownSend (sock.m_shutdownSend),
321  m_shutdownRecv (sock.m_shutdownRecv),
322  m_connected (sock.m_connected),
323  m_msl (sock.m_msl),
324  m_maxWinSize (sock.m_maxWinSize),
325  m_bytesAckedNotProcessed (sock.m_bytesAckedNotProcessed),
326  m_rWnd (sock.m_rWnd),
327  m_highRxMark (sock.m_highRxMark),
328  m_highRxAckMark (sock.m_highRxAckMark),
329  m_sackEnabled (sock.m_sackEnabled),
330  m_winScalingEnabled (sock.m_winScalingEnabled),
331  m_rcvWindShift (sock.m_rcvWindShift),
332  m_sndWindShift (sock.m_sndWindShift),
333  m_timestampEnabled (sock.m_timestampEnabled),
334  m_timestampToEcho (sock.m_timestampToEcho),
335  m_recover (sock.m_recover),
336  m_retxThresh (sock.m_retxThresh),
337  m_limitedTx (sock.m_limitedTx),
338  m_isFirstPartialAck (sock.m_isFirstPartialAck),
339  m_txTrace (sock.m_txTrace),
340  m_rxTrace (sock.m_rxTrace),
341  m_pacingTimer (Timer::REMOVE_ON_DESTROY),
342  m_ecnEchoSeq (sock.m_ecnEchoSeq),
343  m_ecnCESeq (sock.m_ecnCESeq),
344  m_ecnCWRSeq (sock.m_ecnCWRSeq)
345 {
346  NS_LOG_FUNCTION (this);
347  NS_LOG_LOGIC ("Invoked the copy constructor");
348  // Copy the rtt estimator if it is set
349  if (sock.m_rtt)
350  {
351  m_rtt = sock.m_rtt->Copy ();
352  }
353  // Reset all callbacks to null
354  Callback<void, Ptr< Socket > > vPS = MakeNullCallback<void, Ptr<Socket> > ();
355  Callback<void, Ptr<Socket>, const Address &> vPSA = MakeNullCallback<void, Ptr<Socket>, const Address &> ();
356  Callback<void, Ptr<Socket>, uint32_t> vPSUI = MakeNullCallback<void, Ptr<Socket>, uint32_t> ();
357  SetConnectCallback (vPS, vPS);
358  SetDataSentCallback (vPSUI);
359  SetSendCallback (vPSUI);
360  SetRecvCallback (vPS);
361  m_txBuffer = CopyObject (sock.m_txBuffer);
362  m_tcb = CopyObject (sock.m_tcb);
363  m_tcb->m_rxBuffer = CopyObject (sock.m_tcb->m_rxBuffer);
364 
365  m_tcb->m_currentPacingRate = m_tcb->m_maxPacingRate;
366  m_pacingTimer.SetFunction (&TcpSocketBase::NotifyPacingPerformed, this);
367 
368  if (sock.m_congestionControl)
369  {
370  m_congestionControl = sock.m_congestionControl->Fork ();
371  m_congestionControl->Init (m_tcb);
372  }
373 
374  if (sock.m_recoveryOps)
375  {
376  m_recoveryOps = sock.m_recoveryOps->Fork ();
377  }
378 
379  m_rateOps = CreateObject <TcpRateLinux> ();
380  if (m_tcb->m_sendEmptyPacketCallback.IsNull ())
381  {
382  m_tcb->m_sendEmptyPacketCallback = MakeCallback (&TcpSocketBase::SendEmptyPacket, this);
383  }
384 
385  bool ok;
386 
387  ok = m_tcb->TraceConnectWithoutContext ("CongestionWindow",
388  MakeCallback (&TcpSocketBase::UpdateCwnd, this));
389  NS_ASSERT (ok == true);
390 
391  ok = m_tcb->TraceConnectWithoutContext ("CongestionWindowInflated",
392  MakeCallback (&TcpSocketBase::UpdateCwndInfl, this));
393  NS_ASSERT (ok == true);
394 
395  ok = m_tcb->TraceConnectWithoutContext ("SlowStartThreshold",
396  MakeCallback (&TcpSocketBase::UpdateSsThresh, this));
397  NS_ASSERT (ok == true);
398 
399  ok = m_tcb->TraceConnectWithoutContext ("CongState",
400  MakeCallback (&TcpSocketBase::UpdateCongState, this));
401  NS_ASSERT (ok == true);
402 
403  ok = m_tcb->TraceConnectWithoutContext ("EcnState",
404  MakeCallback (&TcpSocketBase::UpdateEcnState, this));
405  NS_ASSERT (ok == true);
406 
407  ok = m_tcb->TraceConnectWithoutContext ("NextTxSequence",
408  MakeCallback (&TcpSocketBase::UpdateNextTxSequence, this));
409  NS_ASSERT (ok == true);
410 
411  ok = m_tcb->TraceConnectWithoutContext ("HighestSequence",
412  MakeCallback (&TcpSocketBase::UpdateHighTxMark, this));
413  NS_ASSERT (ok == true);
414 
415  ok = m_tcb->TraceConnectWithoutContext ("BytesInFlight",
416  MakeCallback (&TcpSocketBase::UpdateBytesInFlight, this));
417  NS_ASSERT (ok == true);
418 
419  ok = m_tcb->TraceConnectWithoutContext ("RTT",
420  MakeCallback (&TcpSocketBase::UpdateRtt, this));
421  NS_ASSERT (ok == true);
422 }
423 
424 TcpSocketBase::~TcpSocketBase (void)
425 {
426  NS_LOG_FUNCTION (this);
427  m_node = nullptr;
428  if (m_endPoint != nullptr)
429  {
430  NS_ASSERT (m_tcp != nullptr);
431  /*
432  * Upon Bind, an Ipv4Endpoint is allocated and set to m_endPoint, and
433  * DestroyCallback is set to TcpSocketBase::Destroy. If we called
434  * m_tcp->DeAllocate, it will destroy its Ipv4EndpointDemux::DeAllocate,
435  * which in turn destroys my m_endPoint, and in turn invokes
436  * TcpSocketBase::Destroy to nullify m_node, m_endPoint, and m_tcp.
437  */
438  NS_ASSERT (m_endPoint != nullptr);
439  m_tcp->DeAllocate (m_endPoint);
440  NS_ASSERT (m_endPoint == nullptr);
441  }
442  if (m_endPoint6 != nullptr)
443  {
444  NS_ASSERT (m_tcp != nullptr);
445  NS_ASSERT (m_endPoint6 != nullptr);
446  m_tcp->DeAllocate (m_endPoint6);
447  NS_ASSERT (m_endPoint6 == nullptr);
448  }
449  m_tcp = 0;
450  CancelAllTimers ();
451 }

495 /* Inherit from Socket class: Bind socket to an end-point in TcpL4Protocol */
496 int
497 TcpSocketBase::Bind (void)
498 {
499  NS_LOG_FUNCTION (this);
500  m_endPoint = m_tcp->Allocate ();
501  if (0 == m_endPoint)
502  {
503  m_errno = ERROR_ADDRNOTAVAIL;
504  return -1;
505  }
506 
507  m_tcp->AddSocket (this);
508 
509  return SetupCallback ();
510 }
511 
512 int
513 TcpSocketBase::Bind6 (void)
514 {
515  NS_LOG_FUNCTION (this);
516  m_endPoint6 = m_tcp->Allocate6 ();
517  if (0 == m_endPoint6)
518  {
519  m_errno = ERROR_ADDRNOTAVAIL;
520  return -1;
521  }
522 
523  m_tcp->AddSocket (this);
524 
525  return SetupCallback ();
526 }
527 
528 /* Inherit from Socket class: Bind socket (with specific address) to an end-point in TcpL4Protocol */
529 int
530 TcpSocketBase::Bind (const Address &address)
531 {
532  NS_LOG_FUNCTION (this << address);
533  if (InetSocketAddress::IsMatchingType (address))
534  {
535  InetSocketAddress transport = InetSocketAddress::ConvertFrom (address);
536  Ipv4Address ipv4 = transport.GetIpv4 ();
537  uint16_t port = transport.GetPort ();
538  SetIpTos (transport.GetTos ());
539  if (ipv4 == Ipv4Address::GetAny () && port == 0)
540  {
541  m_endPoint = m_tcp->Allocate ();
542  }
543  else if (ipv4 == Ipv4Address::GetAny () && port != 0)
544  {
545  m_endPoint = m_tcp->Allocate (GetBoundNetDevice (), port);
546  }
547  else if (ipv4 != Ipv4Address::GetAny () && port == 0)
548  {
549  m_endPoint = m_tcp->Allocate (ipv4);
550  }
551  else if (ipv4 != Ipv4Address::GetAny () && port != 0)
552  {
553  m_endPoint = m_tcp->Allocate (GetBoundNetDevice (), ipv4, port);
554  }
555  if (0 == m_endPoint)
556  {
557  m_errno = port ? ERROR_ADDRINUSE : ERROR_ADDRNOTAVAIL;
558  return -1;
559  }
560  }
561  else if (Inet6SocketAddress::IsMatchingType (address))
562  {
563  Inet6SocketAddress transport = Inet6SocketAddress::ConvertFrom (address);
564  Ipv6Address ipv6 = transport.GetIpv6 ();
565  uint16_t port = transport.GetPort ();
566  if (ipv6 == Ipv6Address::GetAny () && port == 0)
567  {
568  m_endPoint6 = m_tcp->Allocate6 ();
569  }
570  else if (ipv6 == Ipv6Address::GetAny () && port != 0)
571  {
572  m_endPoint6 = m_tcp->Allocate6 (GetBoundNetDevice (), port);
573  }
574  else if (ipv6 != Ipv6Address::GetAny () && port == 0)
575  {
576  m_endPoint6 = m_tcp->Allocate6 (ipv6);
577  }
578  else if (ipv6 != Ipv6Address::GetAny () && port != 0)
579  {
580  m_endPoint6 = m_tcp->Allocate6 (GetBoundNetDevice (), ipv6, port);
581  }
582  if (0 == m_endPoint6)
583  {
584  m_errno = port ? ERROR_ADDRINUSE : ERROR_ADDRNOTAVAIL;
585  return -1;
586  }
587  }
588  else
589  {
590  m_errno = ERROR_INVAL;
591  return -1;
592  }
593 
594  m_tcp->AddSocket (this);
595 
596  NS_LOG_LOGIC ("TcpSocketBase " << this << " got an endpoint: " << m_endPoint);
597 
598  return SetupCallback ();
599 }
600 
601 void
602 TcpSocketBase::SetInitialSSThresh (uint32_t threshold)
603 {
604  NS_ABORT_MSG_UNLESS ( (m_state == CLOSED) || threshold == m_tcb->m_initialSsThresh,
605  "TcpSocketBase::SetSSThresh() cannot change initial ssThresh after connection started.");
606 
607  m_tcb->m_initialSsThresh = threshold;
608 }
609 
610 uint32_t
611 TcpSocketBase::GetInitialSSThresh (void) const
612 {
613  return m_tcb->m_initialSsThresh;
614 }

620  "TcpSocketBase::SetInitialCwnd() cannot change initial cwnd after connection started.");
621 
622  m_tcb->m_initialCWnd = cwnd;

630 
631 /* Inherit from Socket class: Initiate connection to a remote address:port */
632 int
633 TcpSocketBase::Connect (const Address & address)
634 {
635  NS_LOG_FUNCTION (this << address);
636 
637  // If haven't do so, Bind() this socket first
638  if (InetSocketAddress::IsMatchingType (address))
639  {
640  if (m_endPoint == nullptr)
641  {
642  if (Bind () == -1)
643  {
644  NS_ASSERT (m_endPoint == nullptr);
645  return -1; // Bind() failed
646  }
647  NS_ASSERT (m_endPoint != nullptr);
648  }
649  InetSocketAddress transport = InetSocketAddress::ConvertFrom (address);
650  m_endPoint->SetPeer (transport.GetIpv4 (), transport.GetPort ());
651  SetIpTos (transport.GetTos ());
652  m_endPoint6 = nullptr;
653 
654  // Get the appropriate local address and port number from the routing protocol and set up endpoint
655  if (SetupEndpoint () != 0)
656  {
657  NS_LOG_ERROR ("Route to destination does not exist ?!");
658  return -1;
659  }
660  }
661  else if (Inet6SocketAddress::IsMatchingType (address))
662  {
663  // If we are operating on a v4-mapped address, translate the address to
664  // a v4 address and re-call this function
665  Inet6SocketAddress transport = Inet6SocketAddress::ConvertFrom (address);
666  Ipv6Address v6Addr = transport.GetIpv6 ();
667  if (v6Addr.IsIpv4MappedAddress () == true)
668  {
669  Ipv4Address v4Addr = v6Addr.GetIpv4MappedAddress ();
670  return Connect (InetSocketAddress (v4Addr, transport.GetPort ()));
671  }
672 
673  if (m_endPoint6 == nullptr)
674  {
675  if (Bind6 () == -1)
676  {
677  NS_ASSERT (m_endPoint6 == nullptr);
678  return -1; // Bind() failed
679  }
680  NS_ASSERT (m_endPoint6 != nullptr);
681  }
682  m_endPoint6->SetPeer (v6Addr, transport.GetPort ());
683  m_endPoint = nullptr;
684 
685  // Get the appropriate local address and port number from the routing protocol and set up endpoint
686  if (SetupEndpoint6 () != 0)
687  {
688  NS_LOG_ERROR ("Route to destination does not exist ?!");
689  return -1;
690  }
691  }
692  else
693  {
694  m_errno = ERROR_INVAL;
695  return -1;
696  }
697 
698  // Re-initialize parameters in case this socket is being reused after CLOSE
699  m_rtt->Reset ();
700  m_synCount = m_synRetries;
701  m_dataRetrCount = m_dataRetries;
702 
703  // DoConnect() will do state-checking and send a SYN packet
704  return DoConnect ();
705 }
706 
707 /* Inherit from Socket class: Listen on the endpoint for an incoming connection */
708 int
709 TcpSocketBase::Listen (void)
710 {
711  NS_LOG_FUNCTION (this);
712 
713  // Linux quits EINVAL if we're not in CLOSED state, so match what they do
714  if (m_state != CLOSED)
715  {
716  m_errno = ERROR_INVAL;
717  return -1;
718  }
719  // In other cases, set the state to LISTEN and done
720  NS_LOG_DEBUG ("CLOSED -> LISTEN");
721  m_state = LISTEN;
722  return 0;
723 }
724 
725 /* Inherit from Socket class: Kill this socket and signal the peer (if any) */
726 int
727 TcpSocketBase::Close (void)
728 {
729  NS_LOG_FUNCTION (this);
733  if (m_tcb->m_rxBuffer->Size () != 0)
734  {
735  NS_LOG_WARN ("Socket " << this << " << unread rx data during close. Sending reset." <<
736  "This is probably due to a bad sink application; check its code");
737  SendRST ();
738  return 0;
739  }
740 
741  if (m_txBuffer->SizeFromSequence (m_tcb->m_nextTxSequence) > 0)
742  { // App close with pending data must wait until all data transmitted
743  if (m_closeOnEmpty == false)
744  {
745  m_closeOnEmpty = true;
746  NS_LOG_INFO ("Socket " << this << " deferring close, state " << TcpStateName[m_state]);
747  }
748  return 0;
749  }
750  return DoClose ();
751 }
752 
753 /* Inherit from Socket class: Signal a termination of send */
754 int
755 TcpSocketBase::ShutdownSend (void)
756 {
757  NS_LOG_FUNCTION (this);
758 
759  //this prevents data from being added to the buffer
760  m_shutdownSend = true;
761  m_closeOnEmpty = true;
762  //if buffer is already empty, send a fin now
763  //otherwise fin will go when buffer empties.
764  if (m_txBuffer->Size () == 0)
765  {
766  if (m_state == ESTABLISHED || m_state == CLOSE_WAIT)
767  {
768  NS_LOG_INFO ("Empty tx buffer, send fin");
769  SendEmptyPacket (TcpHeader::FIN);
770 
771  if (m_state == ESTABLISHED)
772  { // On active close: I am the first one to send FIN
773  NS_LOG_DEBUG ("ESTABLISHED -> FIN_WAIT_1");
774  m_state = FIN_WAIT_1;
775  }
776  else
777  { // On passive close: Peer sent me FIN already
778  NS_LOG_DEBUG ("CLOSE_WAIT -> LAST_ACK");
779  m_state = LAST_ACK;
780  }
781  }
782  }
783 
784  return 0;
785 }
786 
787 /* Inherit from Socket class: Signal a termination of receive */
788 int
789 TcpSocketBase::ShutdownRecv (void)
790 {
791  NS_LOG_FUNCTION (this);
792  m_shutdownRecv = true;
793  return 0;
794 }
795 
796 /* Inherit from Socket class: Send a packet. Parameter flags is not used.
797  Packet has no TCP header. Invoked by upper-layer application */
798 int
799 TcpSocketBase::Send (Ptr<Packet> p, uint32_t flags)
800 {
801  NS_LOG_FUNCTION (this << p);
802  NS_ABORT_MSG_IF (flags, "use of flags is not supported in TcpSocketBase::Send()");
803  if (m_state == ESTABLISHED || m_state == SYN_SENT || m_state == CLOSE_WAIT)
804  {
805  // Store the packet into Tx buffer
806  if (!m_txBuffer->Add (p))
807  { // TxBuffer overflow, send failed
808  m_errno = ERROR_MSGSIZE;
809  return -1;
810  }
811  if (m_shutdownSend)
812  {
813  m_errno = ERROR_SHUTDOWN;
814  return -1;
815  }
816 
817  m_rateOps->CalculateAppLimited(m_tcb->m_cWnd, m_tcb->m_bytesInFlight, m_tcb->m_segmentSize,
818  m_txBuffer->TailSequence (), m_tcb->m_nextTxSequence,
819  m_txBuffer->GetLost (), m_txBuffer->GetRetransmitsCount ());
820 
821  // Submit the data to lower layers
822  NS_LOG_LOGIC ("txBufSize=" << m_txBuffer->Size () << " state " << TcpStateName[m_state]);
823  if ((m_state == ESTABLISHED || m_state == CLOSE_WAIT) && AvailableWindow () > 0)
824  { // Try to send the data out: Add a little step to allow the application
825  // to fill the buffer
826  if (!m_sendPendingDataEvent.IsRunning ())
827  {
828  m_sendPendingDataEvent = Simulator::Schedule (TimeStep (1),
829  &TcpSocketBase::SendPendingData,
830  this, m_connected);
831  }
832  }
833  return p->GetSize ();
834  }
835  else
836  { // Connection not established yet
837  m_errno = ERROR_NOTCONN;
838  return -1; // Send failure
839  }
840 }
841 
842 /* Inherit from Socket class: In TcpSocketBase, it is same as Send() call */
843 int
844 TcpSocketBase::SendTo (Ptr<Packet> p, uint32_t flags, const Address &address)
845 {
846  NS_UNUSED (address);
847  return Send (p, flags); // SendTo() and Send() are the same
848 }
849 
850 /* Inherit from Socket class: Return data to upper-layer application. Parameter flags
851  is not used. Data is returned as a packet of size no larger than maxSize */
852 Ptr<Packet>
853 TcpSocketBase::Recv (uint32_t maxSize, uint32_t flags)
854 {
855  NS_LOG_FUNCTION (this);
856  NS_ABORT_MSG_IF (flags, "use of flags is not supported in TcpSocketBase::Recv()");
857  if (m_tcb->m_rxBuffer->Size () == 0 && m_state == CLOSE_WAIT)
858  {
859  return Create<Packet> (); // Send EOF on connection close
860  }
861  Ptr<Packet> outPacket = m_tcb->m_rxBuffer->Extract (maxSize);
862  return outPacket;
863 }
864 
865 /* Inherit from Socket class: Recv and return the remote's address */
866 Ptr<Packet>
867 TcpSocketBase::RecvFrom (uint32_t maxSize, uint32_t flags, Address &fromAddress)
868 {
869  NS_LOG_FUNCTION (this << maxSize << flags);
870  Ptr<Packet> packet = Recv (maxSize, flags);
871  // Null packet means no data to read, and an empty packet indicates EOF
872  if (packet != nullptr && packet->GetSize () != 0)
873  {
874  if (m_endPoint != nullptr)
875  {
876  fromAddress = InetSocketAddress (m_endPoint->GetPeerAddress (), m_endPoint->GetPeerPort ());
877  }
878  else if (m_endPoint6 != nullptr)
879  {
880  fromAddress = Inet6SocketAddress (m_endPoint6->GetPeerAddress (), m_endPoint6->GetPeerPort ());
881  }
882  else
883  {
884  fromAddress = InetSocketAddress (Ipv4Address::GetZero (), 0);
885  }
886  }
887  return packet;
888 }

906 /* Inherit from Socket class: Return local address:port */
907 int
908 TcpSocketBase::GetSockName (Address &address) const
909 {
910  NS_LOG_FUNCTION (this);
911  if (m_endPoint != nullptr)
912  {
913  address = InetSocketAddress (m_endPoint->GetLocalAddress (), m_endPoint->GetLocalPort ());
914  }
915  else if (m_endPoint6 != nullptr)
916  {
917  address = Inet6SocketAddress (m_endPoint6->GetLocalAddress (), m_endPoint6->GetLocalPort ());
918  }
919  else
920  { // It is possible to call this method on a socket without a name
921  // in which case, behavior is unspecified
922  // Should this return an InetSocketAddress or an Inet6SocketAddress?
923  address = InetSocketAddress (Ipv4Address::GetZero (), 0);
924  }
925  return 0;
926 }

928 int
929 TcpSocketBase::GetPeerName (Address &address) const
930 {
931  NS_LOG_FUNCTION (this << address);
932 
933  if (!m_endPoint && !m_endPoint6)
934  {
935  m_errno = ERROR_NOTCONN;
936  return -1;
937  }
938 
939  if (m_endPoint)
940  {
941  address = InetSocketAddress (m_endPoint->GetPeerAddress (),
942  m_endPoint->GetPeerPort ());
943  }
944  else if (m_endPoint6)
945  {
946  address = Inet6SocketAddress (m_endPoint6->GetPeerAddress (),
947  m_endPoint6->GetPeerPort ());
948  }
949  else
950  {
951  NS_ASSERT (false);
952  }
953 
954  return 0;

963  if (m_endPoint != nullptr)
964  {
965  m_endPoint->BindToNetDevice (netdevice);
966  }

976 /* Clean up after Bind. Set up callback functions in the end-point. */
977 int
978 TcpSocketBase::SetupCallback (void)
979 {
980  NS_LOG_FUNCTION (this);
981 
982  if (m_endPoint == nullptr && m_endPoint6 == nullptr)
983  {
984  return -1;
985  }
986  if (m_endPoint != nullptr)
987  {
988  m_endPoint->SetRxCallback (MakeCallback (&TcpSocketBase::ForwardUp, Ptr<TcpSocketBase> (this)));
989  m_endPoint->SetIcmpCallback (MakeCallback (&TcpSocketBase::ForwardIcmp, Ptr<TcpSocketBase> (this)));
990  m_endPoint->SetDestroyCallback (MakeCallback (&TcpSocketBase::Destroy, Ptr<TcpSocketBase> (this)));
991  }
992  if (m_endPoint6 != nullptr)
993  {
994  m_endPoint6->SetRxCallback (MakeCallback (&TcpSocketBase::ForwardUp6, Ptr<TcpSocketBase> (this)));
995  m_endPoint6->SetIcmpCallback (MakeCallback (&TcpSocketBase::ForwardIcmp6, Ptr<TcpSocketBase> (this)));
996  m_endPoint6->SetDestroyCallback (MakeCallback (&TcpSocketBase::Destroy6, Ptr<TcpSocketBase> (this)));
997  }
998 
999  return 0;
1000 }
1001 
1002 /* Perform the real connection tasks: Send SYN if allowed, RST if invalid */
1003 int
1004 TcpSocketBase::DoConnect (void)
1005 {
1006  NS_LOG_FUNCTION (this);
1007 
1008  // A new connection is allowed only if this socket does not have a connection
1009  if (m_state == CLOSED || m_state == LISTEN || m_state == SYN_SENT || m_state == LAST_ACK || m_state == CLOSE_WAIT)
1010  { // send a SYN packet and change state into SYN_SENT
1011  // send a SYN packet with ECE and CWR flags set if sender is ECN capable
1012  if (m_tcb->m_useEcn == TcpSocketState::On)
1013  {
1014  SendEmptyPacket (TcpHeader::SYN | TcpHeader::ECE | TcpHeader::CWR);
1015  }
1016  else
1017  {
1018  SendEmptyPacket (TcpHeader::SYN);
1019  }
1020  NS_LOG_DEBUG (TcpStateName[m_state] << " -> SYN_SENT");
1021  m_state = SYN_SENT;
1022  m_tcb->m_ecnState = TcpSocketState::ECN_DISABLED; // because sender is not yet aware about receiver's ECN capability
1023  }
1024  else if (m_state != TIME_WAIT)
1025  { // In states SYN_RCVD, ESTABLISHED, FIN_WAIT_1, FIN_WAIT_2, and CLOSING, an connection
1026  // exists. We send RST, tear down everything, and close this socket.
1027  SendRST ();
1028  CloseAndNotify ();
1029  }
1030  return 0;
1031 }
1032 
1033 /* Do the action to close the socket. Usually send a packet with appropriate
1034  flags depended on the current m_state. */
1035 int
1036 TcpSocketBase::DoClose (void)
1037 {
1038  NS_LOG_FUNCTION (this);
1039  switch (m_state)
1040  {
1041  case SYN_RCVD:
1042  case ESTABLISHED:
1043  // send FIN to close the peer
1044  SendEmptyPacket (TcpHeader::FIN);
1045  NS_LOG_DEBUG ("ESTABLISHED -> FIN_WAIT_1");
1046  m_state = FIN_WAIT_1;
1047  break;
1048  case CLOSE_WAIT:
1049  // send FIN+ACK to close the peer
1050  SendEmptyPacket (TcpHeader::FIN | TcpHeader::ACK);
1051  NS_LOG_DEBUG ("CLOSE_WAIT -> LAST_ACK");
1052  m_state = LAST_ACK;
1053  break;
1054  case SYN_SENT:
1055  case CLOSING:
1056  // Send RST if application closes in SYN_SENT and CLOSING
1057  SendRST ();
1058  CloseAndNotify ();
1059  break;
1060  case LISTEN:
1061  case LAST_ACK:
1062  // In these three states, move to CLOSED and tear down the end point
1063  CloseAndNotify ();
1064  break;
1065  case CLOSED:
1066  case FIN_WAIT_1:
1067  case FIN_WAIT_2:
1068  case TIME_WAIT:
1069  default: /* mute compiler */
1070  // Do nothing in these four states
1071  break;
1072  }
1073  return 0;
1074 }
1075 
1076 /* Peacefully close the socket by notifying the upper layer and deallocate end point */
1077 void
1078 TcpSocketBase::CloseAndNotify (void)
1079 {
1080  NS_LOG_FUNCTION (this);
1081 
1082  if (!m_closeNotified)
1083  {
1084  NotifyNormalClose ();
1085  m_closeNotified = true;
1086  }
1087 
1088  NS_LOG_DEBUG (TcpStateName[m_state] << " -> CLOSED");
1089  m_state = CLOSED;
1090  DeallocateEndPoint ();
1091 }
1092 
1093 
1094 /* Tell if a sequence number range is out side the range that my rx buffer can
1095  accpet */
1096 bool
1097 TcpSocketBase::OutOfRange (SequenceNumber32 head, SequenceNumber32 tail) const
1098 {
1099  if (m_state == LISTEN || m_state == SYN_SENT || m_state == SYN_RCVD)
1100  { // Rx buffer in these states are not initialized.
1101  return false;
1102  }
1103  if (m_state == LAST_ACK || m_state == CLOSING || m_state == CLOSE_WAIT)
1104  { // In LAST_ACK and CLOSING states, it only wait for an ACK and the
1105  // sequence number must equals to m_rxBuffer->NextRxSequence ()
1106  return (m_tcb->m_rxBuffer->NextRxSequence () != head);
1107  }
1108 
1109  // In all other cases, check if the sequence number is in range
1110  return (tail < m_tcb->m_rxBuffer->NextRxSequence () || m_tcb->m_rxBuffer->MaxRxSequence () <= head);
1111 }
1112 
1113 /* Function called by the L3 protocol when it received a packet to pass on to
1114  the TCP. This function is registered as the "RxCallback" function in
1115  SetupCallback(), which invoked by Bind(), and CompleteFork() */
1116 void
1117 TcpSocketBase::ForwardUp (Ptr<Packet> packet, Ipv4Header header, uint16_t port,
1118  Ptr<Ipv4Interface> incomingInterface)
1119 {
1120  NS_LOG_LOGIC ("Socket " << this << " forward up " <<
1121  m_endPoint->GetPeerAddress () <<
1122  ":" << m_endPoint->GetPeerPort () <<
1123  " to " << m_endPoint->GetLocalAddress () <<
1124  ":" << m_endPoint->GetLocalPort ());
1125 
1126  Address fromAddress = InetSocketAddress (header.GetSource (), port);
1127  Address toAddress = InetSocketAddress (header.GetDestination (),
1128  m_endPoint->GetLocalPort ());
1129 
1130  TcpHeader tcpHeader;
1131  uint32_t bytesRemoved = packet->PeekHeader (tcpHeader);
1132 
1133  if (!IsValidTcpSegment (tcpHeader.GetSequenceNumber (), bytesRemoved,
1134  packet->GetSize () - bytesRemoved))
1135  {
1136  return;
1137  }
1138 
1139  if (header.GetEcn() == Ipv4Header::ECN_CE && m_ecnCESeq < tcpHeader.GetSequenceNumber ())
1140  {
1141  NS_LOG_INFO ("Received CE flag is valid");
1142  NS_LOG_DEBUG (TcpSocketState::EcnStateName[m_tcb->m_ecnState] << " -> ECN_CE_RCVD");
1143  m_ecnCESeq = tcpHeader.GetSequenceNumber ();
1144  m_tcb->m_ecnState = TcpSocketState::ECN_CE_RCVD;
1145  m_congestionControl->CwndEvent (m_tcb, TcpSocketState::CA_EVENT_ECN_IS_CE);
1146  }
1147  else if (header.GetEcn() != Ipv4Header::ECN_NotECT && m_tcb->m_ecnState != TcpSocketState::ECN_DISABLED)
1148  {
1149  m_congestionControl->CwndEvent (m_tcb, TcpSocketState::CA_EVENT_ECN_NO_CE);
1150  }
1151 
1152  DoForwardUp (packet, fromAddress, toAddress);
1153 }
1154 
1155 void
1156 TcpSocketBase::ForwardUp6 (Ptr<Packet> packet, Ipv6Header header, uint16_t port,
1157  Ptr<Ipv6Interface> incomingInterface)
1158 {
1159  NS_LOG_LOGIC ("Socket " << this << " forward up " <<
1160  m_endPoint6->GetPeerAddress () <<
1161  ":" << m_endPoint6->GetPeerPort () <<
1162  " to " << m_endPoint6->GetLocalAddress () <<
1163  ":" << m_endPoint6->GetLocalPort ());
1164 
1165  Address fromAddress = Inet6SocketAddress (header.GetSourceAddress (), port);
1166  Address toAddress = Inet6SocketAddress (header.GetDestinationAddress (),
1167  m_endPoint6->GetLocalPort ());
1168 
1169  TcpHeader tcpHeader;
1170  uint32_t bytesRemoved = packet->PeekHeader (tcpHeader);
1171 
1172  if (!IsValidTcpSegment (tcpHeader.GetSequenceNumber (), bytesRemoved,
1173  packet->GetSize () - bytesRemoved))
1174  {
1175  return;
1176  }
1177 
1178  if (header.GetEcn() == Ipv6Header::ECN_CE && m_ecnCESeq < tcpHeader.GetSequenceNumber ())
1179  {
1180  NS_LOG_INFO ("Received CE flag is valid");
1181  NS_LOG_DEBUG (TcpSocketState::EcnStateName[m_tcb->m_ecnState] << " -> ECN_CE_RCVD");
1182  m_ecnCESeq = tcpHeader.GetSequenceNumber ();
1183  m_tcb->m_ecnState = TcpSocketState::ECN_CE_RCVD;
1184  m_congestionControl->CwndEvent (m_tcb, TcpSocketState::CA_EVENT_ECN_IS_CE);
1185  }
1186  else if (header.GetEcn() != Ipv6Header::ECN_NotECT)
1187  {
1188  m_congestionControl->CwndEvent (m_tcb, TcpSocketState::CA_EVENT_ECN_NO_CE);
1189  }
1190 
1191  DoForwardUp (packet, fromAddress, toAddress);
1192 }
